articles.title: Final Fantasy 14: Endwalker Expansion Delayed By Two Weeks, Launch Trailer Released - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Final Fantasy 14: Endwalker will now be released on December 7.
articles.content:

articles.title: Breaking the 10-second barrier - New Straits Times
articles.description: No Malaysian has ever run the 100m in under 10 seconds. For that matter, no one in Southeast Asia.

articles.title: Sabre-toothed cats cared for each other when injured, fossil evidence suggests - CBC.ca
articles.description: Researchers identified bone damage suggesting a cat lived a long life with hip dysplasia, which means it likely only could have survived with help from other animals.
articles.content: Scientists have found that the fossilized remains of an adult sabre-toothed cat show signs that it lived with a congenital hip condition, suggesting that it lived in a social group with other cats wh… [+4474 chars]

articles.title: Netizens furious over minister's gold-leaf steak - The Star Online
articles.description: A video showing a powerful Vietnamese official enjoying a bite of steak smothered in gold leaf at a luxury London restaurant has sparked online anger in the South-East Asian country, where the average person earns a few dollars a day.
